passive.name: Aura of Sobs
passive.line: 10 feet. An attic whisperer enshrouds itself in a tapestry of stolen voices. Each living creature that enters or starts their turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 17 Will save or the unnerving, bitter sobs render them distraught and they become stupefied 1 for as long as they remain within the aura. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune for 1 hour.
The attic whisperer can activate or deactivate the aura with a single free action, which has the concentrate trait.

reaction.name: Whispered Despair
reaction.line: A creature with an active emotion effect enters an attic whisperer's aura of sobs
The attic whisperer attempts to counteract the emotion effect, with a counteract level of 2 and a counteract modifier of +12.

action.name: Steal Breath
action.line: The attic whisperer siphons the breath from living creatures, sapping their strength. A living creature hit by a jaws Strike must attempt a DC 19 Fortitude save.
The target is enfeebled 1 for 1 round.
The target is enfeebled 1 for 24 hours and fatigued.
The target is enfeebled 1 for 24 hours, is fatigued, and falls unconscious.

action.name: Steal Voice
action.line: When an attic whisperer hits a living creature with a bony hand Strike, it tries to pull the victim's voice into its aura. The victim must attempt a DC 19 Will save.
The target's voice is weak for 1 minute. Anytime it attempts an action with the auditory trait, it must succeed at a DC 3 flat check or the action is disrupted.

The target loses the ability to speak for 1 hour, until the curse is removed, or until the attic whisperer is destroyed, whichever comes first. During this time, the attic whisperer can perfectly momic the target's, and the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against that attic whisperer's aura of sobs.
As failure, but the effect lasts until the attic whisperer is destroyed or the curse is removed.
